book.title: Book Module RCE
book.description: Potential RCE vulnerability in the Book module print tool.
book.remediation: Update Moodle to version 3.9.1 or higher.

rss_client.title: RSS Client Block RCE
rss_client.description: Potential RCE via SSRF in the RSS Client block viewfeed.php.
rss_client.remediation: Update Moodle to version 3.9.2 or higher.

data.title: Database Activity Module RCE
data.description: Potential RCE vulnerability in the Database Activity module templates.
data.remediation: Update Moodle to version 3.11.3, 3.10.6, 3.9.9 or higher.

jmol.title: JMol Filter RCE
jmol.description: Potential RCE vulnerability in the JMol filter PHP script.
jmol.remediation: Update Moodle to version 3.11.5, 3.10.8, 3.9.11 or higher.

quizaccess_seb.title: Safe Exam Browser Quiz Access Rule RCE
quizaccess_seb.description: Potential RCE vulnerability in the Safe Exam Browser Quiz Access Rule plugin.
affected_moodle_versions: All versions of the plugin before 2020102601
quizaccess_seb.remediation: Update the Safe Exam Browser plugin to the latest version.
